mapper.select: SELECT p.product_id AS productId, p.product_name AS productName, COALESCE(SUM(wob.quantity), 0) AS totalOutboundQty, COALESCE(AVG(wis.quantity), 0) AS averageInventory, ROUND(COALESCE(SUM(wob.quantity), 0) / NULLIF(AVG(wis.quantity), 0), 2) AS turnoverRate FROM product p LEFT JOIN warehouse_outbound wob ON wob.product_id = p.product_id AND DATE(wob.outbounded_at) BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} LEFT JOIN warehouse_inventory_snapshot wis ON wis.product_id = p.product_id AND DATE(wis.snapshot_date) BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} WHERE p.is_deleted = 0 GROUP BY p.product_id, p.product_name ORDER BY turnoverRate DESC
